Constructor Detail

EmailAddressNameIdentifier

public EmailAddressNameIdentifier(String name,
                                  String nameQualifier,
                                  String format)
                           throws SAMLException
Creates an emailAddress name identifier out of its component parts. (The factory mechanism of the superclass requires that this constructor be overridden.)

Parameters:
name - Name of subject
nameQualifier - Federates or qualifies subject name
format - URI describing name semantics and format
Throws:
SAMLException - Raised if a name cannot be constructed

EmailAddressNameIdentifier

                           throws SAMLException

Parameters:

Throws:
SAMLException - Thrown if the object cannot be constructed

An email address matcher.
See Also:
Matcher

checkValidity

public void checkValidity()
                   throws SAMLException
Makes sure each of the following characteristics of this object are satisfied:
  • The name is not empty
  • The name is a valid email address
  • The format is not empty
  • The format is the standard SAML 1.1 emailAddress format

Overrides:
checkValidity in class SAMLNameIdentifier
Throws:
SAMLException - if any of the above are not satisfied
See Also:
SAMLNameIdentifier.checkValidity()
